bptree

Class BPNode<Key extends Comparable<Key>>

  • Object
    • BPNode<Key>
  • Type Parameters:
    Key - the type of the keys stored in this B+ tree node. This type has to implement the Comparable interface.

    public class BPNode<Key extends Comparable<Key>>
extends Object

    IMPORTANT: Do not modify this class. When you submit your code, all changes to this file are discarded automatically. Hence, it may happen that you program is not working on the submission system.

    A simple implementation of a B+ tree node that has an identifier, a node degree, a list of keys (of a specified type), and a list of children to other B+ tree nodes.

      • addKey

        public void addKey(int index,
                   Key key)

        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())

      • addKey

        public void addKey(Key key)
        Appends the specified key to this B+ tree node. This is equivalent to the call addKey(keys().size(), key).
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())

      • removeKey

        public Key removeKey(int index)
        Removes the key at a specified index (0-based) of this B+ tree node. Be aware that this method does not perform any range checks for the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the key to be removed (0-based)
        Returns:
        the removed key
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())

      • removeLastKey

        public Key removeLastKey()
        Removes the last key of this B+ tree node. This is equivalent to the call removeKey(keys().size() - 1).
        Returns:
        the removed key if it existed, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())

      • removeChild

        Returns:
        the removed child
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())

      • removeLastChild

        public BPNode<Key> removeLastChild()
        Removes the last child of this B+ tree node. This is equivalent to the call removeChild(children().size() - 1).
        Returns:
        the removed child if it existed, null otherwise
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size())
